texPreview 1.4.1

Try to coerce an object into a knitr_kable object

Source: R/kable.R
as_kable.Rd

coerce objects into a knitr_kable class object with a latex format

as.kable(x)

Arguments

x

object

Value

an object of class knitr_kable

Examples


tex <- '\\begin{tabular}{llr}
\\hline
\\multicolumn{2}{c}{Item} \\\\
\\cline{1-2}
Animal    & Description & Price (\\$) \\\\
\\hline
Gnat      & per gram    & 13.65      \\\\
& each        & 0.01       \\\\
Gnu       & stuffed     & 92.50      \\\\
Emu       & stuffed     & 33.33      \\\\
Armadillo & frozen      & 8.99       \\\\
\\hline
\\end{tabular}'

ktex <- as.kable(tex)

class(ktex)
#> [1] "knitr_kable"

attributes(ktex)
#> $class
#> [1] "knitr_kable"
#> 
#> $format
#> [1] "latex"
#> 

ktex
#> \begin{tabular}{llr}
#> \hline
#> \multicolumn{2}{c}{Item} \\
#> \cline{1-2}
#> Animal    & Description & Price (\$) \\
#> \hline
#> Gnat      & per gram    & 13.65      \\
#> & each        & 0.01       \\
#> Gnu       & stuffed     & 92.50      \\
#> Emu       & stuffed     & 33.33      \\
#> Armadillo & frozen      & 8.99       \\
#> \hline
#> \end{tabular}

# using an input call

x <- tex_preview(tex,returnType = 'input')

x
#> \input{/tmp/RtmpmcDCen/tex_temp.tex}

ktex_input <- as.kable(x)

class(ktex_input)
#> [1] "knitr_kable"

attributes(ktex_input)
#> $class
#> [1] "knitr_kable"
#> 
#> $format
#> [1] "latex"
#> 

ktex_input
#> \resizebox{\textwidth}{!}{
#> \begin{tabular}{llr}
#> \hline
#> \multicolumn{2}{c}{Item} \\
#> \cline{1-2}
#> Animal    & Description & Price (\$) \\
#> \hline
#> Gnat      & per gram    & 13.65      \\
#> & each        & 0.01       \\
#> Gnu       & stuffed     & 92.50      \\
#> Emu       & stuffed     & 33.33      \\
#> Armadillo & frozen      & 8.99       \\
#> \hline
#> \end{tabular}
#> }

# file path

x <- tex_preview(tex,returnType = 'input')

ktex_path <- as.kable(file.path(tempdir(),'tex_temp.tex'))

class(ktex_path)
#> [1] "knitr_kable"

attributes(ktex_path)
#> $class
#> [1] "knitr_kable"
#> 
#> $format
#> [1] "latex"
#> 

ktex_path
#> \resizebox{\textwidth}{!}{
#> \begin{tabular}{llr}
#> \hline
#> \multicolumn{2}{c}{Item} \\
#> \cline{1-2}
#> Animal    & Description & Price (\$) \\
#> \hline
#> Gnat      & per gram    & 13.65      \\
#> & each        & 0.01       \\
#> Gnu       & stuffed     & 92.50      \\
#> Emu       & stuffed     & 33.33      \\
#> Armadillo & frozen      & 8.99       \\
#> \hline
#> \end{tabular}
#> }
